sqlMap.select: SELECT a.yzb610 as yzb610, a.yzb617 as yzb617, a.yzb611 as yzb611, a.yzb612 as yzb612, a.yzb613 as yzb613, a.yzb615 as yzb615, a.yzb616 as yzb616, a.aae011 as aae011, a.yae116 as yae116, a.aae017 as aae017, a.aae036 as aae036 FROM zb61 a WHERE a.yzb611 = #yzb611:VARCHAR#

SELECT a.yzb620 as yzb620, a.yzb610 as yzb610, a.yzb621 as yzb621, a.yzb623 as yzb623, a.yzb624 as yzb624, a.yzb625 as yzb625, a.yzb626 as yzb626, fun_getcodedesc('YZB626', a.yzb626) AS yzb626_desc, a.yzb628 as yzb628, a.yzb62d as yzb62d, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62D', a.yzb62d) AS yzb62d_desc, a.yzb62a as yzb62a, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62A', a.yzb62a) AS yzb62a_desc, a.yzb62b as yzb62b, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62B', a.yzb62b) AS yzb62b_desc, a.yzb62c as yzb62c, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62C', a.yzb62c) AS yzb62c_desc, a.yzb641 as yzb641, fun_getcodedesc('YZB641', a.yzb641) AS yzb641_desc, a.yzb62f as yzb62f, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62F', a.yzb62f) AS yzb62f_desc, a.aae100 as aae100, fun_getcodedesc('AAE100', a.aae100) AS aae100_desc FROM zb62 a WHERE a.yzb610 = #yzb610# AND a.aae100 = '1' and a.yzb62d = '1' ORDER BY yzb621

SELECT a.yzb620 as yzb620, a.yzb610 as yzb610, a.yzb621 as yzb621, a.yzb623 as yzb623, a.yzb624 as yzb624, a.yzb625 as yzb625, a.yzb626 as yzb626, fun_getcodedesc('YZB626', a.yzb626) AS yzb626_desc, a.yzb628 as yzb628, a.yzb62d as yzb62d, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62D', a.yzb62d) AS yzb62d_desc, a.yzb62a as yzb62a, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62A', a.yzb62a) AS yzb62a_desc, a.yzb62b as yzb62b, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62B', a.yzb62b) AS yzb62b_desc, a.yzb62c as yzb62c, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62C', a.yzb62c) AS yzb62c_desc, a.yzb641 as yzb641, fun_getcodedesc('YZB641', a.yzb641) AS yzb641_desc, a.yzb62f as yzb62f, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62F', a.yzb62f) AS yzb62f_desc, a.aae100 as aae100, fun_getcodedesc('AAE100', a.aae100) AS aae100_desc FROM zb62 a WHERE a.yzb610 = #yzb610:DOUBLE#
a.yzb62b = #yzb62b:VARCHAR#
a.yzb62b IN ('1', '2')
AND a.aae100 = '1' ORDER BY yzb621

SELECT a.yzb620 as yzb620, a.yzb610 as yzb610, a.yzb621 as yzb621, a.yzb623 as yzb623, a.yzb624 as yzb624, a.yzb625 as yzb625, a.yzb626 as yzb626, fun_getcodedesc('YZB626', a.yzb626) AS yzb626_desc, a.yzb628 as yzb628, a.yzb62d as yzb62d, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62D', a.yzb62d) AS yzb62d_desc, a.yzb62a as yzb62a, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62A', a.yzb62a) AS yzb62a_desc, a.yzb62b as yzb62b, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62B', a.yzb62b) AS yzb62b_desc, a.yzb62c as yzb62c, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62C', a.yzb62c) AS yzb62c_desc, a.yzb641 as yzb641, fun_getcodedesc('YZB641', a.yzb641) AS yzb641_desc, a.yzb62f as yzb62f, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62F', a.yzb62f) AS yzb62f_desc, a.aae100 as aae100, fun_getcodedesc('AAE100', a.aae100) AS aae100_desc FROM zb62 a WHERE a.yzb610 = #yzb610:DOUBLE# AND a.yzb62b IN ('1', '2')
a.yzb62c = #yzb62c:VARCHAR#
a.yzb62c IN ('1', '2')
AND a.aae100 = '1' ORDER BY yzb621

SELECT a.yzb620 as yzb620, a.yzb610 as yzb610, a.yzb621 as yzb621, a.yzb623 as yzb623, a.yzb624 as yzb624, a.yzb625 as yzb625, a.yzb626 as yzb626, fun_getcodedesc('YZB626', a.yzb626) AS yzb626_desc, a.yzb628 as yzb628, a.yzb62d as yzb62d, fun_getcodedesc('YAB62D', a.yzb62d) AS yzb629_desc, a.yzb62a as yzb62a, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62A', a.yzb62a) AS yzb62a_desc, a.yzb62b as yzb62b, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62B', a.yzb62b) AS yzb62b_desc, a.yzb62c as yzb62c, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62C', a.yzb62c) AS yzb62c_desc, a.yzb641 as yzb641, fun_getcodedesc('YZB641', a.yzb641) AS yzb641_desc, a.yzb62f as yzb62f, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62F', a.yzb62f) AS yzb62f_desc, a.aae100 as aae100, fun_getcodedesc('AAE100', a.aae100) AS aae100_desc FROM zb62 a WHERE a.yzb620 = #yzb620#
SELECT a.yzb630 as yzb630, a.yzb620 as yzb620, a.yzb631 as yzb631, fun_getcodedesc('YZB631', a.yzb631) AS yzb631_desc FROM zb63 a WHERE a.yzb620 = #yzb620:DOUBLE#
SELECT a.yzb640 as yzb640, a.yzb620 as yzb620, a.yzb641 as yzb641, fun_getcodedesc('YZB641', a.yzb641) AS yzb641_desc FROM zb64 a WHERE a.yzb620 = #yzb620:DOUBLE#

SELECT a.yzb650 as yzb650, a.yzb651 as yzb651, a.yzb652 as yzb652, b.yzb623 as yzb623, b.yzb624 as yzb624, b.yzb625 as yzb625, b.yzb626 as yzb626 FROM zb65 a, zb62 b WHERE a.yzb620 = b.yzb620 AND b.yzb610 = #yzb610:DOUBLE# ORDER BY yzb651

SELECT a.yzb620 as yzb620, a.yzb610 as yzb610, a.yzb621 as yzb621, a.yzb623 as yzb623, a.yzb624 as yzb624, a.yzb625 as yzb625, a.yzb626 as yzb626, fun_getcodedesc('YZB626', a.yzb626) AS yzb626_desc, a.yzb628 as yzb628, a.yzb629 as yzb629, fun_getcodedesc('YZB629', a.yzb629) AS yzb629_desc, a.yzb62a as yzb62a, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62A', a.yzb62a) AS yzb62a_desc, a.yzb62b as yzb62b, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62B', a.yzb62b) AS yzb62b_desc, a.yzb62c as yzb62c, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62C', a.yzb62c) AS yzb62c_desc, a.aae100 as aae100, fun_getcodedesc('AAE100', a.aae100) AS aae100_desc FROM zb62 a,zb61 b WHERE a.yzb610 = b.yzb610 AND a.aae100 = '1'
b.yzb611 = #yzb611:VARCHAR#
a.yzb62b = #yzb62b:VARCHAR#
a.yzb62c = #yzb62c:VARCHAR#
ORDER BY yzb621

SELECT a.yzb620 as yzb620, a.yzb610 as yzb610, a.yzb621 as yzb621, a.yzb623 as yzb623, a.yzb624 as yzb624, a.yzb625 as yzb625, a.yzb626 as yzb626, fun_getcodedesc('YZB626', a.yzb626) AS yzb626_desc, a.yzb628 as yzb628, a.yzb62d as yzb62d, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62D', a.yzb62d) AS yzb62d_desc, a.yzb62a as yzb62a, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62A', a.yzb62a) AS yzb62a_desc, a.yzb62b as yzb62b, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62B', a.yzb62b) AS yzb62b_desc, a.yzb62c as yzb62c, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62C', a.yzb62c) AS yzb62c_desc, a.yzb641 as yzb641, fun_getcodedesc('YZB641', a.yzb641) AS yzb641_desc, a.yzb62f as yzb62f, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62F', a.yzb62f) AS yzb62f_desc, a.aae100 as aae100, fun_getcodedesc('AAE100', a.aae100) AS aae100_desc FROM zb62 a,zb61 b WHERE a.yzb610 = b.yzb610 and b.yzb611 = #yzb611:VARCHAR#
a.yzb62b IN ('1', '2')
AND a.aae100 = '1' ORDER BY yzb621

SELECT a.yzb620 as yzb620, a.yzb610 as yzb610, a.yzb621 as yzb621, a.yzb623 as yzb623, a.yzb624 as yzb624, a.yzb625 as yzb625, a.yzb626 as yzb626, fun_getcodedesc('YZB626', a.yzb626) AS yzb626_desc, a.yzb628 as yzb628, a.yzb62d as yzb62d, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62D', a.yzb62d) AS yzb62d_desc, a.yzb62a as yzb62a, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62A', a.yzb62a) AS yzb62a_desc, a.yzb62b as yzb62b, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62B', a.yzb62b) AS yzb62b_desc, a.yzb62c as yzb62c, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62C', a.yzb62c) AS yzb62c_desc, a.yzb641 as yzb641, fun_getcodedesc('YZB641', a.yzb641) AS yzb641_desc, a.yzb62f as yzb62f, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62F', a.yzb62f) AS yzb62f_desc, a.aae100 as aae100, fun_getcodedesc('AAE100', a.aae100) AS aae100_desc FROM zb62 a,zb61 b WHERE a.yzb610 = b.yzb610 and b.yzb611 = #yzb611:VARCHAR#
a.yzb62c IN
#yzb62cs[]#
AND a.aae100 = '1' ORDER BY yzb621

SELECT a.yzb620 as yzb620, a.yzb610 as yzb610, a.yzb621 as yzb621, a.yzb623 as yzb623, a.yzb624 as yzb624, a.yzb625 as yzb625, a.yzb626 as yzb626, fun_getcodedesc('YZB626', a.yzb626) AS yzb626_desc, a.yzb628 as yzb628, a.yzb62d as yzb62d, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62D', a.yzb62d) AS yzb62d_desc, a.yzb62a as yzb62a, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62A', a.yzb62a) AS yzb62a_desc, a.yzb62b as yzb62b, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62B', a.yzb62b) AS yzb62b_desc, a.yzb62c as yzb62c, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62C', a.yzb62c) AS yzb62c_desc, a.yzb641 as yzb641, fun_getcodedesc('YZB641', a.yzb641) AS yzb641_desc, a.yzb62f as yzb62f, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62F', a.yzb62f) AS yzb62f_desc, a.aae100 as aae100, fun_getcodedesc('AAE100', a.aae100) AS aae100_desc FROM zb62 a,zb61 b WHERE a.yzb610 = b.yzb610 AND a.aae100 = '1' and a.yzb62f IN ('1', '2')
b.yzb611 = #yzb611:VARCHAR#
ORDER BY yzb621

SELECT a.yzb620 as yzb620, a.yzb610 as yzb610, a.yzb621 as yzb621, a.yzb623 as yzb623, a.yzb624 as yzb624, a.yzb625 as yzb625, a.yzb626 as yzb626, fun_getcodedesc('YZB626', a.yzb626) AS yzb626_desc, a.yzb628 as yzb628, a.yzb62d as yzb62d, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62D', a.yzb62d) AS yzb62d_desc, a.yzb62a as yzb62a, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62A', a.yzb62a) AS yzb62a_desc, a.yzb62b as yzb62b, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62B', a.yzb62b) AS yzb62b_desc, a.yzb62c as yzb62c, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62C', a.yzb62c) AS yzb62c_desc, a.yzb641 as yzb641, fun_getcodedesc('YZB641', a.yzb641) AS yzb641_desc, a.yzb62f as yzb62f, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62F', a.yzb62f) AS yzb62f_desc, a.aae100 as aae100, fun_getcodedesc('AAE100', a.aae100) AS aae100_desc FROM zb62 a,zb61 b WHERE a.yzb610 = b.yzb610 AND a.aae100 = '1' and a.yzb62f IN ('1')
b.yzb611 = #yzb611:VARCHAR#
ORDER BY yzb621

SELECT a.yzb620 as yzb620, a.yzb610 as yzb610, a.yzb621 as yzb621, a.yzb623 as yzb623, a.yzb624 as yzb624, a.yzb625 as yzb625, a.yzb626 as yzb626, fun_getcodedesc('YZB626', a.yzb626) AS yzb626_desc, a.yzb628 as yzb628, a.yzb62d as yzb62d, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62D', a.yzb62d) AS yzb62d_desc, a.yzb62a as yzb62a, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62A', a.yzb62a) AS yzb62a_desc, a.yzb62b as yzb62b, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62B', a.yzb62b) AS yzb62b_desc, a.yzb62c as yzb62c, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62C', a.yzb62c) AS yzb62c_desc, a.yzb641 as yzb641, fun_getcodedesc('YZB641', a.yzb641) AS yzb641_desc, a.yzb62f as yzb62f, fun_getcodedesc('YZB62F', a.yzb62f) AS yzb62f_desc, a.aae100 as aae100, c.yzb652 as yzb652, c.YZB651 as yzb651, fun_getcodedesc('AAE100', a.aae100) AS aae100_desc FROM zb62 a,zb61 b,zb65 c WHERE a.yzb610 = b.yzb610 and a.yzb620 = c.yzb620 AND a.aae100 = '1'
b.yzb611 = #yzb611:VARCHAR#
ORDER BY c.YZB651
